src.utils.checkings module¶

src.utils.checkings.categorizeAndCheckModule(file)¶

Checks the incoming installation script file and categorizes it.

Parameters:file – The incomming file to be categorized.
Returns:A tuple containing the type of the installation script.
src.utils.checkings.checkNewModuleForm(formDict)¶

On new module registration, check all fields if they are valid.

Parameters:formDict – A JSON-dictionary containing all user input for registration.
Returns:An okay or an detailed error message for the user.
src.utils.checkings.checkPassedUserFormular(userDict)¶
src.utils.checkings.checkToolAvailability()¶

Checks if all automation tools are available.

Returns:True if all tools are there.

src.utils.local_resource.get_app_version(shell_call)¶

Executes a shell call for obtaining version numbers of an app.

Parameters:shell_call – A unix shell call which returns a version.
Returns:The app version number.
src.utils.local_resource.get_cpu_load()¶

src.utils.local_resource.get_processor_name()¶

src.utils.packerUtils module¶

src.utils.packerUtils.buildPackerJsonFromConfig(json_data, osImageName)¶

Assembles a json dict builder for packer.

Parameters:
  • json_data – Juvenile packer.json content
  • osImageName – The name of the new image.

Returns: An extended json configuration for packer.
